Description:
Room For All The Family!
Spacious 4 bedroom plus study family home set on a generous 746m2 allotment with oodles of space for the growing family also with a 1 bedroom & bathroom attached granny flat.The large open plan meals & family area has access to a large deck area perfect for entertaining. The home is kept comfortable with central gas heating but the lounge has a solid fuel heater for cosy winter evenings at home. Car, caravan & boat accommodation plus childrens cubby. A great inspection!

Description:
GREAT STARTER, DOWNSIZE, INVEST ON APP. 640 SQM, BIG SHED FOR THE TRADESMAN.
A short walk to schools, jetty, golf club and parklands. A very well designed home with spacious lounge room, kitchen with plenty of room for dining and doors opening to outside patio, three bedrooms, central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet plus laundry. Features include gas fire place, BIR's, subtle tones and quality fittings, light and bright throughout. Carport, garden shed plus enormous shed which can be used as workshop, still room for 4 cars, caravan/boat. This is a perfect and affordable home call now for inspection.

Description:
A GREAT START, COURT LOCATION, BAY VIEWS AND 718 SQM OF LAND.
Just the spot to make a great start where you can extend now or later and take full advantage of the great bay views. Separarte loungeroom, adjacent kitchen, both overlooking the big backyard and views, third bedroom is presently set up as dining room, easy to revert, master has WIR or study nook ( a little alcove), central bathroom and separate toilet. Features split system, tank, timber boards ready to stain .......carport and garage. A very tidy home, so much potential with the jetty, schools, shops, parklands and golf club all within walking distance. A little beauty, will not last!

Description:
TOP COURT POSITION, TOP BAY VIEWS, APPROX. 790 SQM AND AFFORDABLE!
This home has so much to offer with front balcony overlooking the bay, just a short walk to the Dell and Golf Club.......position plus. Open plan living including kitchen, dining and plenty of room for relaxing. Three bedrooms, master with views and BIR's, central bathroom used as 2 way, laundry and separate toilet. Features include gas stove, gas heater and split cooler/heater, loads of storage inside and under home, roller shutters, fans and garden shed. Triple carport + workshop with 2nd toilet/ hand basin, plenty of space for further vehicles/caravan and or boat off street. This could be just the one with so much scope for the astute buyer to live now but add in time. Big enough to develop STCA. Inspect now by appointment.

Description:
King of the Castle
Beautifully appointed double storey home with commanding Bay views in a quiet court location. Consisting of 4 bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk in robe). A home theatre room and formal lounge downstairs. Impressive kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops. The upstairs family room leads onto a spacious balcony with impressive views over Corio bay and Geelong. Extra features include gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout. The property has a freestanding double lockup garage and an undercover alfresco area complimented by the well maintained low maintenance garden. This property offers buyers the opportunity to acquire a substantial family home with spectacular views well below replacement cost.

Description:
Boutique Seaside Sanctuary With Gorgeous Views
Exquisitely located only metres from the beach with your very own sea views all the way to the You Yangs is this masterfully built home oozing style and sophistication. Lovingly designed and always cared for, the home is ready for a new family looking for a sea change or locals looking to upgrade and stay in this wonderful location.
Offering substantial family accommodation, the home includes 3 spacious bedrooms (master with WIR and luxurious ensuite) plus large study accompanied by central bathroom for the family. Two light filled living areas service the household along with upstairs deck allowing you to kick back with a wine and enjoy the gorgeous views over the water. The kitchen and dining areas are fully fitted with stainless steel appliances all looking out to your very own hidden retreat to the rear of the home.
One step outside and it feels like you're in your very own private getaway with outstanding undercover entertaining and wonderfully designed pool to relax in during the warmer months. Just over the fence you will find extensive parklands perfect for the kids to roam or to walk the dogs all within a short stroll to the local boat ramp. This is a truly stellar location with local wineries, golf course and new supermarket all within arm's reach along with Ocean Grove and Barwon Heads just a short drive away.
Extras: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, downstairs powder room, water tank and garden shed.
Insights: 4 Kewarra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
YOUR COASTAL RETREAT
On 585m2 of land this beautiful split level home with views is the perfect coastal retreat. Open plan living upstairs opening onto the west facing balcony to take in the beautiful sunsets and views of the bay and You Yangs. On the second level you have your 3 bedrooms, toilet and bathroom. Downstairs is a second living area or a self-contained space with kitchenette and en-suite opening to the well landscaped backyard. With gas ducted heating, 2 x RC AC and studio/workshop adjoining the carport to complete the picture. This quaint property has to be experienced as it has a feel of its own.
Insights: 8 Coolabah Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
NOTHING TO DO BUT UNPACK IN THIS TOP SPOT!
Affordable option here at No. 6 with the advantage of shops, boat ramp, golf club as well as schools within walking distance. Light and bright throughout with a spacious lounge room, second living area combines dining and kitchen with doors opening to undercover entertaining area. Four bedrooms, all with BIR's, the master has ensuite as well, bathroom and laundry complete the floorplan. Features include wood fire, gas heating, ceiling fans, slate flooring, and airconditioner. Double carport with side access for more vehicles or caravan/boat, sheds, water tank and good storage. This home represents good buying for size, position and fabulous condition. A very good purchase to the astute buyer.

Description:
PERFECT TO START OR A FANTASTIC DOWNSIZE OPPORTUNITY, INVESTORS?
A stylish renovation, absolutely nothing to do and the attention to detail is immediately obvious ... As stated perfect! The living room has wide doors opening to the front decking, adjacent kitchen is well designed for easy flow to meals area. Three bedrooms, the master has four BIR's, second has two, central bathroom, separate toilet/powder room and laundry. Large undercover area is a real plus with so much room for informal entertaining. Features include gas space heater, large built in shelving, smeg kitchen appliances, large pantry and so much storage under home. Side drive to enormous garage with workshop, plus toilet/bath, room for a caravan and/or boat ... a tradesman's dream. Another advantage is the leafy easement at the rear of the property creating that private haven. No. 23 sparkles and will impress immediately.
Insights: 23 Barongarook Drive, CLIFTON SPRINGS VIC 3222 was last sold in 2010 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON SPRINGS have recently been sold.

Description:
Ultimate Weekender
Behind the Double Timber Sliding Gates providing streamlined access for cars, boat, caravan and trailer, is this stylish split level home.
Built of Summerhill Pink pressed bricks, the layout is modern. Upon entering the home you are immediately welcomed into the main living zone with raked timber ceilings. A mix of timber features and neutral wall tones throughout, provides a warm ambiance and compliments any furnishings. On this middle level is also the Master Bedroom with ensuite.
The lower zone of this split level home offers two additional bedrooms and main bathroom with an extra deep bath for luxuriating in after a day at the beach. Step up to the top level and here you are in the hub of the home. The modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances overlooks the dining area, the covered outdoor entertainment area, the ideally located laundry and a second living space or alternative home office.
The outdoor entertainment area accesses the rear garden and throughout the property, attention has been placed on low maintenance for the home owner.
Insights: 18 Bayshore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Lovely Light Filled Home!
From the moment you step into this delightful family home you get a sense of the great service it has offered its beloved owners for the past 23 years. Light filled rooms and spacious living areas are a great feature of this property. 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes, L-shaped lounge/dining and a user friendly kitchen/meals area offer great living zones for the entire family. A triple carport and an as new double garage/shed complete the picture. Set on big block approximately 641m2 within an established pocket of Clifton Springs. This home is walking distance to schools and conveniently positioned close to beaches, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp a number of other local amenities.

Description:
Your door into home ownership
This neat as a pin home on a corner block is ideally located for shops, school, and the Clifton Springs Jetty at the end of the street. Upon entering the home, double doors lead to a spacious lounge dining area with full length windows to allow the natural light to filter in. This bright home offers warm timber tones in the kitchen adjacent to the dining area.
Along the central hallway are three good sized bedrooms all with mirrored built in robes that give a sense of extra space in each room. A good sized central bathroom, with laundry directly across from the kitchen, completes this entry level home.
It offers secure picket fencing to the rear garden area where the garage doubles as a Man's Shed finished with outdoor covered meals area, a bar and built in TV screen. The children's cubby and play area are close by.
This home is ideal for investors, first home buyers or a young family.
Insights: 1 Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Prestigious Family Home with the Lot
Set on a 1474sqm corner allotment this home provides privacy and tranquility. As you walk along the curved brick paving to the entrance, you are unlikely to be prepared for what awaits inside.
This beautifully presented brick home speaks quality throughout, and is surrounded by established gardens including a rose garden, several mature fruit trees and a vegetable garden zone. At the front entrance are a Weeping Cherry tree and a Mulberry tree that frame the home elegantly.
Inside you are welcomed into a formal lounge and dining room with full length windows providing views out to the front, and rear garden and pool area. The master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, and a home office complete the front end of the home, two further bedrooms with generous BIR's and full sized windows, a central bathroom and sizeable laundry.
A feature kitchen with stainless steel appliances and an island bench faces out to a meals area and inground swimming pool beyond. The second living room has direct access to the return covered balcony leading down to the pool, alfresco dining area and gardens. From the balcony one has views towards Geelong and across Corio Bay.
This home must be viewed to fully appreciate what is on offer.
Insights: 2 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Live the lifestyle and enjoy the view
Positioned to take advantage of the panoramic views over Corio Bay, this property has plenty to offer the astute buyer. The ground floor includes a study, two separate bedrooms and family bathroom. Low maintenance gardens with outdoor undercover entertainment area and a swimming pool. Make the sea change and enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer.
